<div class="description">  A sing-along songbook with more than 100 interactive elements in 3 songs and the little fox music studio! Brought to you by the team that created the bestselling App Nighty Night! Great for kids between 2 and 6 years old. <p>HIGHLIGHTS: <br>1. Learn popular kids songs!<br>2. Stunning designs by Oscar nominated artist Heidi Wittlinger <br>3. Play your own music and record your songs with the little fox in his tree house sound studio!<br>4. Explore more than 100 interactive elements and sounds! <br>5. 3 childrens songs: London Bridge, Evening Song , Old Mac Donald had a farm<br>2. The Music Studio full of surprises<br>3. Karaoke Mode<br>4. Languages: English and German<p>LONDON BRIDGE<br>London is a busy town! Especially since the bridge has a gap. Tourists, a pirate and a parrot, a crocodile, a mermaid and a whale, a cab with a periscope; everything moves and can be touched while the little fox dances behind the windows of the towers.<p>EVENING SONG<br>Many animals live in this spectacular night scene; you just have to find them. The owl follows your finger, fascinating ghosts are flying through the air and the stars burst into fireworks. Do you know how to paint with northern lights?<p>OLD MAC DONALD HAD A FARM<br>While old Mac Donald sleeps under his tree all year, the animals go crazy. Seasons change if you press the button; find out what cow, bee and the young chicks do in summer, spring and winter. How about the little fox? He dresses up as a sheep!<p>MUSIC STUDIO<br>Birds, Frogs and dishes sing and jingle! Mommy Fox is knitting to the rhythm and the little fox is dancing. Almost everything in the studio makes a noise, be ready to explore every little corner. <p>FEEDBACK FROM APP USERS:<p>Little Fox Music Box is the kind of App you wish you had when you were growing up.&quot; // Famigo <p>Adorable ! - Cute interactions and message. / Lovebabbyapps, US<p><br>PRESS:<p>&quot;The kids that we field tested this app with were enraptured with every aspect and element, and &quot;WOW-O-WOW&quot; was heard over and over and over again! This app is beyond anything we have experienced to date.&quot; // teacherswithapps.com<p>&quot;I could describe the value of the experience in terms of early music education. I could describe the meticulous design of the app, even down to the music when the credits are rolling. I could continue to wax eloquent. But words fail me. Really, you have to be there. So go there. Get the app.<br>Just one word of warning  hide the iPad from your children until youve had plenty of play time of your own. If you dont, it may be many years before you see this app again.&quot; // Gill Robins ipadappreviewsby.gillrobins.com<p>&quot;This is a real work of craft&quot; // guardian.co.uk<p>&quot;I downloaded Little Fox Music Box last night and my very active 18-month year old daughter (who doesnt typically stay still for longer than 15 seconds) sat on my lap laughing, clapping, and interacting with the scenes for at least 30 minutes and wasnt ready to stop(....)Its a fantastic app!&quot; // Leanna Loft imore.com <p>---------<p>If you experience any trouble with the App or have any questions or comments, please don&#39;t hesitate to contact us any time: <a href="mailto:contact@foxandsheep.com">contact@foxandsheep.com</a>. simply the best camera application for portraits. It has everything you need in a camera and photo editor to help you capture and create photos worth awards. <br>It offers a huge variety of lenses and shooting modes, hand-picked filters and the best beauty effects, run through our own face detection technology.<br>All of this plus more than 800 decoration options and the most amazing collage effects.<br> <br>Our All-in-One features include:<p> Powerful Camera<p>- 7 camera lenses inspired on the famous DSLR cameras<br>- Out of Focus, Anti-Shake, Timer, Self-Portrait, Touch Shots and other shooting modes to help you get the best out of your capturing experience.<p> Hand-picked Filters and Borders<p>- More than 20 carefully selected filters to bring different emotions to your photos. Adjust the light and intensity of the filters individually. Add one of our 20+ borders and light filters to give your photos a completely different feel.<p> Amazing Beautifying Effects<p>- Big Eyes, Smile, Slim Face, Clear Spots, Liquify, Brighten and more options to help you make the most beautiful portraits.<br>- No more zooming in and out and doing things manually! Our face detection technology allows Cymera to locate every trait of your face and know exactly where to add the effect.<br> - We have compiled over 70 different realistic hair and makeup items to help you complement your looks. Truly the best beautifying effects in the market!<p> Storytelling Collage<p>- One picture is not enough. Make photo stories with our multiple collage options. <br>- Cymera offers diverse fixed and freestyle collage layouts plus really beautiful backgrounds and editing functions that will help you have the best collage experience. <p> Fun Decorations<p>- Over 800 decoration options that include: stickers, comic masks, frames and more. All free.<br>- A beautiful variety or brushes with different colors, lines, patterns and shapes to help you express yourself and make unique photo decorations.<p> Oldies but Goodies Editing Functions<p>- Cymera offers all the other complementary editing functions such as rotation, cropping, auto level, brightness, contrast, saturation, sharpening and more to enhance the quality and versatility or your photos. All in a simple and easy to use interface.<p> Sharing<p>- Share with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Mixi and Weibo<p> Language Support<p>Cymera offers language support for: English, Spanish, German, Japanese, Korean and Chinese (Traditional and simplified)<p> Awards<p>Awarded the Certificate of Merit at the 2012 Asia Smartphone Apps Contest for the Creative Lifestyle category.<p> FAQ:<p>Q) The position of the Camera is inverted when trying to use the front camera<br>A) Depending on the device, the front camera could get inverted. If you want to fix this go to Settings&gt;turn ON the Self-shot image flip-H option and that will do.<p>Q) I want to download more stickers, comic masks and frames. Are they available for free?<br>A) YES! All our downloadable items are FREE<p>Q) Id like to manually write things on my photos. how do i do this?<br>A) Easy. Just go to Cymera&gt;Decoration&gt;Brush&gt; select the color and style of your preference and have fun!<br> <br>Q) Id like to be able to merge different photos together.<br>A) Use our multiple collage functions to make beautiful photo stories. Make it better with our different background and collage layout options. All free.<p> Use our API whenever you need to use Cymera to take and edit photos fast and easy.<p>URL : <a      Aberration<br>         Hiding objects<br>         Choice for selecting your national flag<br>         Notepad on a wall where you can write short note.<br>         Function calendar<br>         Function digital and analog clocks<br>         Place your images into the scene from your gallery<br>         Can be used as a portrait or landscape<br>         Smooth animations<br>         7 different camera views<br>         3 versions of textures for better optimization<br>         Particles of dust, sparks, snow and other<br>         Nice and realistic lighting with a glow<p><br> Appszoom.com - 10ravens have created this excellent live wallpaper full of customizable options<p> Pockethype.net - This is one of the most amazing live wallpapers with beatiful graphics, interactive possibilities and personal customization options that I&#39;ve ever seen on the market yet<p>It&#39;s made with an exceptionally high standard, while paying close attention to detail as well as being one of the most realistic HD graphics on the market. Also, its full of interactive features like the gyroscope, automatic weather, 360  seamless view and much more. You can even warm up by the cozy fireplace, watch the beautiful sunset from the window, switch on the TV console or just relax and paint in front of the easel.<p>Overall, it works great and seamlessly with phones, tablets with android version 2.2 and higher. Plus, it can be used in portrait or landscape mode and even if the graphic is highly detailed and complex, due to our great optimization the resolution will not drain the life of your battery at all. <p>My Log Home is divided into 8 parts; working corner with a desk and pc, window with a marvelous view of the lake and mountains, relaxation corner with a cozy fireplace, a place for your personal images and function calendar, part where you can find the TV and console, art corner with an easel, part for sleeping or stairs to the next floor. All of these parts are nicely illuminated and  you can find a lot of interactive features; function clocks, calendar, notepad and much more.<p>Customize and personalize your wallpaper as you like by using a simple menu to create a unique place for yourself. You can insert and place your own photos straight from your gallery, hide or show items in the scene, choose the weather you like from a clear sky, rain, storm or mist to changing the size of the moon and choose one of the seasons or just switch to automatic weather. Also, you can choose your national flag or add some notes into a diary and much more.<p>Visit our website www.10ravensinteractive.com or if you have idea how to improve My Log Home iLWP then write us <div class="description">  &quot;A shining example of what a free game can be.&quot; - PixelFreak - 91/100<br>&quot;From probably the best IAP system in mobile gaming, to some incredibly fun gameplay, this is a title that you seriously need to install into your Android device pronto!&quot; - GameWoof - 4.5/5<br>&quot;It should be a crime that a game this good is free, but there it is...&quot; - AndroidSpin<br>&quot;Quadropus Rampage is a very lively, very fun, and very addicting game that you dont want to miss out on.&quot; - Tom Christiansen of Indie Game Mag - 91/100<p>Quadropus Rampage is an Endless Roguelike that casts you, the player, as an enraged, four-legged cephalopod. It is your quest to reach the bottom of the ocean and destroy Pete, the evil god of the sea, before his army of abyssal creatures can overtake the ocean. <p>***Features*** <p> Be a quadropus - Go on a rampage <br> Perfect fusion of roguelike and brawler - Hit enemies in their stupid faces <br> Endless Gameplay - Randomly generated weapons, levels, and enemies that keep the action fresh until you die from thumb exhaustion <br> Intuitive, fast-paced combat - Easy to learn, difficult to master. Dodge, block, stab, smash, and spin your way to victory! <br> Five epic boss fights - Pursue Pete into the depths and bludgeon his mouth off <br> Mastery system - 23 achievements with gameplay altering rewards <br> Artifacts - Unearth 39 treasures that let you shoot lasers out of your face or turn your pet starfish into an explosive boomerang <br> Extensive upgrade tracks - Invest orbs in your quadropus to make him stronger <br> Hilarious Characters - Break your ribs from intense chuckling <br> Google Play Game Services (for Android 4.0 and up) - Show your friends who&#39;s the neck-slappingest Quadropus<br> Xperia Play support - Because WHY NOT? (Buttons only, no joypads yet)<br> Support for most Android tablets, and all resolutions of devices<p>From the creators of the critically acclaimed Towelfight 2 : The Monocle of Destiny. <p>GET TO </div> <div class="description">  &quot;Nighty Night!&quot; is the perfect App for a daily go-to-sleep ritual with sweet music and elegant narration. <p>This App has been downloaded over 2 Million times and is a great success worldwide!<p>Watching all the animals go to sleep is a lovely way to set the mood for bedtime. The interactive bedtime &quot;Nighty Night&quot; is brought to you from Oscar-Nominee Heidi Wittlinger (2002, best animated short) who put a lot of passion and effort in constructing little sets made of paper and combining them with 2D illustration and animation. <p>Languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Russian and Portuguese. <p>FEEDBACK FROM APP USERS: &quot;This book finally proves to me that a kids book can be as great electronically as they are on paper. </div> <div class="description">  If you love incredible racing games, CSR Racing is the only FREE racing game you need to play!<p>Race your dream car in the ultimate test: a drag race along deserted city streets. CSR Racing combines stunning, high-fidelity graphics with addictive gameplay to create a new type of racing experience. <p>Upgrade your Audi R8, BMW M3 or Chevy Corvette with turbos, nitrous injection and aerodynamic tweaks to beat tougher and tougher opponents. And when youre ready, its time to challenge the crews that rule the city. <p>STUNNING GRAPHICS <br>Featuring a breakthrough in graphics fidelity, CSR Racing smashes the barriers between consoles and your Android device. Stunning detail and next-gen lighting combine to beat any 1080p console racing game on the market. <p>LICENSED CARS <br>Officially licensed cars from Audi, Bentley, BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, GM, Mini, McLaren, Pagani, and Nissan; incl. Audi R8, Ford GT, Chevrolet Camaro, McLaren MP4-12C, Nissan GT-R, BMW M3 and a few surprises! <p>THE ULTIMATE CHALLENGE <br>R8 vs GT-R, Continental Supersports vs SLR McLaren. Your car against theirs. In a straight line. It&#39;s about power, skill and tactics. Hit the right revs and let that turbo work. But deploy the nitrous at the wrong time, and you&#39;re toast. <p>UPGRADE YOUR CAR <br>Choose from turbos, engine stages, ECU tweaks, racing tires and much more to strategically upgrade your car to fit your driving style. But remember: no two cars are the same  don&#39;t overload a RWD on skinny tires with power it can&#39;t handle. <p>CUSTOMIZE YOUR RIDE <br>Make a statement with custom license plates, custom paints and original custom decals. <p>RULE THE CITY <br>You are not alone. The crews that rule the city are watching you, and you will soon face their best drivers. Beat their bosses, and you&#39;ll take over their district. So far so good  but all is not what it seems <p>---- <p>Requires Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) and above.<p>Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up. <p>PLEASE NOTE! CSR Racing is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.<br>To prevent unauthorised purchases, select Set or Change PIN from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the Use PIN for Purchases option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction. Please be aware that this option is only available on Android OS 3.x and above.<p>CSR Racing is published by NaturalMotion Games <p>-------------------------------------- <p>Like us on Facebook: <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.facebook.com/csrracinggame&amp;sa=D&amp;usg=AFQjCNHyBoV_0ax9UTU8Z77yuePaudSAjg" target="_blank">https://www.facebook.com/csrracinggame</a><br>Follow us on Twitter:  <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://twitter.com/CSRRacing&amp;sa=D&amp;usg=AFQjCNHtLTnA0FxhDTduSlQ5EbQnZZ7-Nw" target="_blank">https://twitter.com/CSRRacing</a><br>Subscribe to our YouTube channel: <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.youtube.com/user/naturalmotiongames&amp;sa=D&amp;usg=AFQjCNEnnEZC6OmWsoTRcxIHYgilQlSzYg" target="_blank">https://www.youtube.com/user/naturalmotiongames</a><p>** DONT MISS OUR OTHER GAMES!! Its never been easier to score an in-store coupon while shopping at the mall, or to find free shipping codes on your phone. RetailMeNots new location based offer alerts ensure you never miss out on a great deal for your favorite stores, and with the biggest arsenal of top coupon categories for use on the go, or to save for later, you will never forget a coupon again.<br> <br>Browse RetailMeNots Nearby Malls, Top Coupons, Popular Stores, Categories, or Todays Hot Deals to find the right deal for you. Plan your shopping trips by finding the best nearby offers and sales with location based deal alerts at over 500 malls and outlet malls, and get coupon expiration reminders before you miss out. <br> <br>As the #1 coupon site in the world, our promo codes and deals deliver the best savings on clothes, electronics, food, entertainment and more! What are you waiting for? Get our free coupons app today.<br> <p><br>FEATURES<br>       Find nearby shopping malls with great offers. NEW<br>       Redeem in-store coupons at checkout directly from your phone.<br>       Get deal alerts when shopping at your favorite malls. NEW<br>       Get expiration alerts for your saved coupons. <br>       Find the nearest store to your location. We have outlined the specific reasons for each permission below)<br>       Your Location -- Allows us to provide you with details around nearby malls &amp; stores, and helps us deliver you offer and savings available at these locations.<br>       Bluetooth -- Also helps us accurately detect your location and surface nearby offers.<br>       Phone Calls -- Allows us to detect incoming calls and let your phone interrupt our app.<br>       Storage -- We store a small amount of information to maximize app performance and load times. We will never access or modify any of your stored data.<br>       System Tools/Battery -- Allows us to detect system and battery states so we can adjust app behavior for situations such as low battery.<br>       Your Accounts -- Allows us to access Google Maps<br>       Your Applications Information -- The app runs an initial check for location at startup. <span unique weapons enhanced by 86 augmentations. His only means of defense is his enchanted monocle, which fires animal projectiles in wild combinations to dispatch his foes. As the story unfolds Hardik will find unexpected friends, overcome immense challenges, and become a hero to an entire world. <p>Key Features:<br> Unique Shot Rotation system -- Build and customize a rotating clip of Jectiles to burn, poison, freeze, electrocute, pinch, and explode your enemies.<br> 43 unique weapons with 86 augmentations<br> 14 insane power-ups  Choose three different power-ups and equip them simultaneously, including the Zombie Whistle, Blo-Gun, Ice Belt, and Blazing Shoes!<br> 10 personality-laden bosses  So personable you will shed a single, manly tear after defeating each one of them.<br> Procedurally generated world  Thousands of rooms with plenty of things to kill. Uses OpenGL ES 2.0.<br>- Optimized for low memory usage and little to no impact on system performance.<br>- Supports all Android devices with Android 2.3 and up.<p>Note: This app is a live wallpaper and has no launcher icon. - THE MIND-READING KEYBOARD<p>#1 selling app in 57 countries, over 150,000  reviews<br>Shockingly accurate, making for a creepy-fast typing experience. - TIME Magazine<p>SMART &amp; EASY<br>- SwiftKey replaces your phones keyboard with one that understands you.<br>- It predicts your next word before youve even pressed a key.<br>- It provides the worlds most accurate autocorrect in 60 languages.<br>SwiftKey makes touchscreen typing faster, easier and more personalized no matter what app youre typing in!<p>LEARNING<br>- SwiftKey learns as you type, adapting to you and your way of writing.<br>- Train SwiftKey on your message archives from Gmail, Facebook and Twitter, or your blog.<br>- SwiftKey doesnt just learn your popular words, it learns how you use them together.<p>TAP OR FLOW YOUR WORDS<br>- Switch between tapping and gesture-typing with SwiftKey Flow.<br>- Flow combines the mind-reading capabilities of SwiftKey with the speed and ease of gliding your fingers across the screen.<br>- Flow gives word predictions in real-time as you gesture.<br>- Type entire sentences without lifting your finger from the screen, simply by sliding to the space bar between words -- what we call Flow through Space.<p>MULTI-LINGUAL<br>- SwiftKey supports contextual prediction in 60 languages and counting.<br>- Enable up to three languages at once.<br>- Naturally combine languages without having to change a setting.<br>See <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.swiftkey.net/en/%23features&amp;sa=D&amp;usg=AFQjCNFt3sTDzR4K117NzBeCVjpHyXV0dQ" <div class="description">   This special edition of ColorUp is FREE today with AppGratis! <p>Bring your photo&#39;s to life with ColorUp! With this technique you can create stunning images that people will rave over. <p>ColorUp brings you an advanced feature set, with the functionality you need to work quickly and easily. <p>Features include: <p>* 12 Image Filters (Sepia, Vintage, Low Saturation and more...) <br>* 5 different types of brush types <br>* Color Enrichment <br>* Color Shifting <br>* Edge Softening to hide mistakes <br>* Background Blur (Depth of Field) <br>* Background Contrast <p>* &quot;Spy Mode&quot; to reveal painted areas <br>* Double-tap to pop in and out of full screen <br>* Orientation lock when in full screen mode, so you can easily flip and turn the image as you paint. <br>* Pinch to Zoom for pixel level accuracy <p>* Import directly from Camera <br>* Import from Image Library (Pro version only) <br>* Export HD quality images <br>* Unlimited Undo and Redo <p><br>Don&#39;t settle for less powerful apps, this is the one you want!<p>**NOTE: Lite version only supports images loaded from the camera. <div class="description">  Do you want to learn Lucid Dreaming? Awoken is the tool to do that.<p>FEATURES:<p>- Reality Checking: Reminders to analyze your surroundings, so you can learn to check if you are dreaming. <p>- Dream Clues: low audio cues that can trigger your lucid dreaming by playing a special Totem Sound you choose.<p>- Dream Journal with optional pin-protection: Have a silent notification ready each morning to start recollecting your dream. Keep your journal entries in a searchable list and protect your dreams if needed.<p>- Pausing your training: Learning lucid dreaming takes some time. Sometimes you want to pause your training for just a few days.<p>- Oneironaut Achievements: An explorer of dream worlds is called an Oneironaut. Follow you progress and keep track of your stats.<p>----<p>Lucid dreaming is learning to know you are dreaming, while you are dreaming. Becoming aware that you are dreaming allows you to shape, influence and direct your dreams with clarity, instead of being uncritically controlled by them.<p>When you are aware of being in a dream, you can also learn to master experiences that aren&#39;t possible in waking reality. You can fly, breathe under water or whatever else you put your mind to. With the sensations as real as in waking life. Your mind is the only limit.<p>It is reported that lucid dreaming can also help to overcome nightmares, be used to rehearse success for real life scenarios and be used train creativity.<p>Become awoken - Start dreaming for real!<p>----<p>tags: lucid dreaming guide, dream guide, dream journal, reality checking, what is lucid dreaming, master lucid dreaming, lucid dreaming trainer, wake up, <span class="price buy track-click" data-uitype="221"> Installed </span> </span> <span style="display:none" class="acquired-label"> <span class="acquired-icon"></span> </span> </span>  </span> </div> <div class="description">  DashClock is a replacement lock screen clock widget for Android 4.2+ phones and tablets. It also exposes additional status items called extensions. The widget comes bundled with extensions that give you instant access to:<p> Your current local weather<br> Missed calls and unread text messages<br> Your next calendar appointment<br> Unread Gmail inbox or priority inbox conversations<br> Your next scheduled alarm<p>To add the widget to your Android 4.2 device&#39;s lock screen, simply swipe to the left-most page of your lock screen and touch the &quot;+&quot; icon. Then, select &quot;DashClock&quot; to customize and add the widget. You can make this the primary lock screen widget, replacing the default clock, by first touching-and-holding it and then dragging it horizontally to the very rightmost position.<p>Developers: DashClock is extensible! Visit the open source project at <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=http://code.google.com/p/dashclock&amp;sa=D&amp;usg=AFQjCNEG5huiwGosZrDL797b6uDo6RuJlA" target="_blank">http://code.google.com/p/dashclock</a> to learn more or just check out the source.<p>Have a bug report or feature request? Just find the issue or file a new one here: <a href="https://www.google.com/url?q=http://code.google.com/p/dashclock/issues/list&amp;sa=D&amp;usg=AFQjCNHOvECqMq9hEc_ANhHk_IhNMvVp9g" target="_blank">http://code.google.com/p/dashclock/issues/list</a> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock"></a>  </div> </span> </span>  </span> </div> <div class="description">  Big Fish is pleased to announce that Fairway Solitaire is back, and it&#39;s bigger and better than ever! One of the most exciting and addictive card games available includes solitaire hands dealt on more than 408 hand-crafted golf holes, 4 mini games, 37 trophies, a golf shop, golf announcers, hazard cards, and one SERIOUSLY ticked off gopher! <p>&quot; an incredibly awesome puzzle game masquerading as solitaire.&quot; - Penny Arcade<p>&quot;It might look like a straightforward card game on the surface but there&#39;s much more to Fairway Solitaire thanks to its assured, inventive design. It&#39;s a hugely enjoyable, supremely polished strategic deck shuffler that should suit puzzle fans to a tee.&quot; PocketGamer: 8/10<p>Follow this hilariously sarcastic story of the gopher and his seething disdain and desire to put all golfers in their place! From beachside courses where palm trees sway, to the hustle and bustle of illuminated city courses, keep your eye on the prize because there is nowhere this gopher wont follow. Score the best runs by clearing the card deck using the least amount of moves, and dont forget about those mulligans! Whether scoring a double bogey or 3 under par, this hit will have you laughing so loud youll forget to be quiet on the golf course! <p>TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! <p> Features  <p> Bright scenery and captivating artwork bring the classic to life!<br> Delightful commentary and appealing sounds enhance game play<br> Fill up your golf meter to earn helpful golf bucks<br> Find Iron cards on the green to add to your golf bag<br> Watch out for water, wedge, and rough cards that test your skills!<br> Use your golf bucks for one iron, or fill your entire bag!<br> Wild Shot cards can either make or break a terrific golf game! <p> Discover more from Big Fish Games!  <p>Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere  on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. on.\\u0026quot; - Tom Christiansen of Indie Game Mag - 91/100\\u003cp\\u003eQuadropus Rampage is an Endless Roguelike that casts you, the player, as an enraged, four-legged cephalopod. It is your quest to reach the bottom of the ocean and destroy Pete, the evil god of the sea, before his army of abyssal creatures can overtake the ocean. \\u003cp\\u003e***Features*** \\u003cp\\u003e Be a quadropus - Go on a rampage \\u003cbr\\u003e Perfect fusion of roguelike and brawler - Hit enemies in their stupid faces \\u003cbr\\u003e Endless Gameplay - Randomly generated weapons, levels, and enemies that keep the action fresh until you die from thumb exhaustion \\u003cbr\\u003e Intuitive, fast-paced combat - Easy to learn, difficult to master. Dodge, block, stab, smash, and spin your way to victory! \\u003cbr\\u003e Five epic boss fights - Pursue Pete into the depths and bludgeon his mouth off \\u003cbr\\u003e Mastery system - 23 achievements with gameplay altering rewards \\u003cbr\\u003e Artifacts - Unearth 39 treasures that let you shoot lasers out of your face or turn your pet starfish into an explosive boomerang \\u003cbr\\u003e Extensive upgrade tracks - Invest orbs in your quadropus to make him stronger \\u003cbr\\u003e Hilarious Characters - Break your ribs from intense chuckling \\u003cbr\\u003e Google Play Game Services (for Android 4.0 and up) - Show your friends who\\u0026#39;s the neck-slappingest Quadropus\\u003cbr\\u003e Xperia Play support - Because WHY NOT? connections such as which networks exist and are connected.\42,0]\n,[\42full network access\42,\42Allows the app to create network sockets and use custom network protocols. and Wi-Fi. Apps may use this to determine where you are, and may consume additional battery power.\42,1]\n,[\42approximate location (network-based)\42,\42Allows the app to get your approximate location. This location is derived by location services using network location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi. These location services must be turned on and available to your device for the app to use them. Apps may use this to determine approximately where you are.\42,1]\n]\n]\n,[\42Network communication\42,[[\42view network connections\42,\42Allows the app to view information about network connections such as which networks exist and are connected.\42,0]\n,[\42full network access\42,\42Allows the app to create network sockets and use custom network protocols. The browser and other applications provide means to send data to the internet, so this permission is not required to send data to the internet.\42,1]\n,[\42receive data from Internet\42,\42Allows apps to accept cloud to device messages sent by the app\47s service. Using this service will incur data usage. Malicious apps could cause excess data usage.\42,0]\n]\n]\n,[\42Phone calls\42,[[\42directly call phone numbers\42,\42Allows the app to call phone numbers without your intervention. This may result in unexpected charges or calls. Note that this doesn\47t allow the app to call emergency numbers. Malicious apps may cost you money by making calls without your confirmation.\42,1]\n,[\42read phone status and identity\42,\42Allows the app to access the phone features of the device.
